 2015-08072015-06-11,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  CIC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to replace all references respecting Employment and Social Development Canada’s “opinion” regarding the likely effect the employment of a foreign national would have on the Canadian labour with “assessment”.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0147 Publication Date: 2015-07-01
